001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.shapes;
002
003public interface Shape1D extends Shape {
004
005    default int getDimensions() {
006        return 1;
007    }
008
009    int getLength();
010
011    static Shape1D of(int length) {
012        return new Shape1D() {
013            @Override
014            public int getLength() {
015                return length;
016            }
017        };
018    }
019
020}
